domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @CBSNews @weijia Stop blaming the media, the truth rarely comes from the White House anymore. That name is really offensive because doesn't only mock the Chinese, but also many Asians. Stop blaming them, it's not the time to point fingers, it's time to work together. Fight Coronavirus.
